entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deprecated package used by System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #93577
  • Improve regex source generator / compiler special-casing of whitespace #93573
    9.0.0
  • Outerloop test System.Diagnostics.Tests.DiagnosticSourceEventSourceBridgeTests.Stress_WriteConcurrently_DoesntCrash crashing often #93569
  • Provide support for alternative rounding modes for division and remainder of division. #93568
    9.0.0
  • ILoggerProvider implementation - does not read the config settings #93562
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Base 64 Decoding Should Have An Auto-Padding Option #93552
  • [wasm] run browser-bench sample with https connection #93551
    9.0.0
  • nibblemapmacros do a linear scan #93550
    Future
  • NativeFileReference regression in .NET 8.0 #93538
    8.0.0
  • WindowsIdentity.RunImpersonated does not achieve TokenAccessLevels.Impersonate #93537
  • [NativeAOT] CQ regression vs JIT - torn loop in `NonPackedIndexOfValueType` #93536
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Interop/UnmanagedCallersOnly/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest/UnmanagedCallersOnlyNegativeTest.cmd #93534
  • Test failure Interop/SuppressGCTransition/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest/SuppressGCTransitionNegativeTest.cmd #93533

Closed

  • .NET 7.0.12 contains old version of 'Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native' #93570
  • [mono][net7] Cherrypick fixes to build runtime with Xcode 15 #93009
    7.0.x
  • Slow flock on nfs file share #93207
    Future
  • ilc crash while compiling System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Roslyn tests #91885
    9.0.0
  • Improve error message for dictionary key converters not implementing `ReadAsPropertyName`/`WriteAsPropertyName`. #93406
    Future
  • Use new .NET logo in NuGet packages. #77695
    Future
  • Error with running or building on 7.0.401/2 #93325
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/ConstantFolding/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro/value_numbering_checked_arithmetic_with_constants_ro.dll #93506
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/AssertionPropagation/ArrBoundElim/ArrBoundElim.dll #93508
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M12-Beta2/b71869/b71869/b71869.dll #93444
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/CLR-x86-JIT/V1-M09.5-PDC/b25815/b25815/b25815.dll #93443
  • Test failure: JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/ldc_mul_ovf_i4/ldc_mul_ovf_i4.dll #93441
  • Test failure: JIT/jit64/rtchecks/overflow/overflow02_mul/overflow02_mul.dll #93442
    8.0.0
  • `System.Diagnostics.CodeAnalysis.ExperimentalAttribute` allows construction without a diagnostic ID #93557
  • `dns.lookup.duration` should report `error.type` #92837
    8.0.0
  • Rename `dns.lookupS.duration` to `dns.lookup.duration` #92917
    8.0.0
  • [HTTP Metrics] Rename `server.socket.address` to `network.peer.address` #92956
    8.0.0
  • [Metrics] `error.type` doesn't report `Exception.FullName` #93302
    8.0.0
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Cng.Tests.ECDsaCngPkcs8Tests.NoPlaintextExportAllowsEncryptedPkcs8 fails on Windows.Nano.1809.Amd64.Open #91971
    Future
  • [AOT] Add support for compressing output file #93510
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
    9.0.0
  • LibraryImport issue #93544
  • [API Proposal]: Add InvalidEnumArgumentException.ThrowIfUndefined #92071
  • [wasm] MT browser-bench crash #93398
    9.0.0
  • System.Diagnostics.Metrics - Prevent Instrument memory leak #93241
    Future
  • Test failure System.Tests.Int32Tests_GenericMath.op_CheckedMultiplyTest #93532
  • Process::TotalProcessorTime is about 42 times lower than expected on ARM64 Mac #91958
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Arm64/Unix] Use native memcpy/memmove for ARM64 as glibc 2.36 added optimizations #93579
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [6.0] Bump Ubuntu 19.10 queues to 22.04 #93578
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle MultiRegNode in gtGetRegMask() #93576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Workloads test: Install the current app.ref pack also #93571
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide System.IO.Hashing package readme #93567
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable negative interop tests on GCStress. #93566
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add Label support in new ILGenerator #93565
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Emit/Call member references in new ILGenerator #93564
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fix binding types with optional string parameters #93563
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0] [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93559
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [hot reload][debugger] Resolve field types before use #93558
    area-EnC-mono
  • [wasm] Fix Vector128 SIMD fmin and fmax #93556
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Optimizing arm64 trampolines #93547
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 9.0.0
  • Update MsQuic to 2.2.3 #93542
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • Fix analysis of interface methods on generic types #93540
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • reuse existing resource file #93539
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 9.0.0
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    needs-area-label

Merged

  • [release/7.0-staging] ProcessTests: allow WorkingSet to be zero just after launching the pr… #93572
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • [release/7.0][mono] Backport offsets-tool fixes for Xcode 15 compatibility #93543
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fixes not find assembly and pdb if it's not using the default path #92955
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 7.0.x
  • Improve DictionaryKeyTypeNotSupported error message #93553
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93554
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • [release/7.0-staging] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93505
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • [release/8.0] Mention Frozen.* types in PACKAGE.md for System.Collections.Immutable #93561
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Collections, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose: update test for change in Linux kernel. #93502
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Sockets, blocking-clean-ci
  • Make atomics `GenTreeIndir`-derived #93295
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix memory leak in MemoryCache #92550
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • [browser] Disable HybridGlobalization failure #93560
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, blocking-clean-ci
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93528
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93530
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Use our now-split MarshalAs parsing to simplify our "forwarder with marshalling attributes" logic #93157
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Workaround for C++ compiler bug on Arm64 #93529
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Vector512 Support for Enumerable<int>.Min/Max #93369
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Mention Frozen.* types in PACKAGE.md for System.Collections.Immutable #93541
    area-System.Collections
  • [browser] bench - separate scripts for memory snapshot #93548
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Sync offsets-tool/clang python bindings with upstream #93545
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Fix CMD_OBJECT_REF_GET_VALUES_BY_FIELD_TOKEN behavior #93363
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] streamline Task/Promise marshalling #93010
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] refactor entropy #93466
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Make FailFast blocks cold (GS cookies) #93429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization] Improve logging on FirstDayOfWeek failures #93380
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add missing ArrayPool returns to failure branches #92511
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete outdated workaround #93525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr

Updated

  • JIT: Optimize constant range tests #93521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT compiler build to the official build #92095
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Set bbJumpKind and bbJumpDest during block initialization #93415
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: defer creating throw helper blocks until simple lower #93371
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorizes IndexOfMin/Max/Magnitude #93469
    area-System.Numerics
  • [mono][amd64] Pass SIMD arguments in SIMD registers. #93182
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Enable Adding Disabled Tests Skip Reason to their XML Results Log From issues.targets #93492
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Added PowerShell.Benchmarks to SuperPMI collections #93493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert all tests under baseservices to the merged test infrastructure #91560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix crossgen2 invocation error under sourcebuild #93450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • [JIT] Fold some bitwise operations to vpternlog #91227
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Remove base type rooting for types in rooted assemblies #93355
    Servicing-approved, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • StreamOnSqlBytes Read/Write on Spans #86674
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Rewrite DbBuffer Read/Write methods with stackalloc #88395
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • Additional Validation for PauseThresholdWriter and ResumeThresholdWriter #77359
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP] source-build: don't skip building Native Aot artifacts. #88520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Use `add_link_options` and `target_link_options` in cmake #92844
    area-Infrastructure
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Use the improved vectorization algorithm for binary and ternary TensorPrimitives operations #93409
    area-System.Numerics
  • [wasm] Runtime tests - fix CI build #93486
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Clean up internal usage of `RuntimeComponents` to always be treated as MSBuild Item #91800
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [browser] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #93456
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.DirectoryServices.Protocols package readme #93518
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Add missing readonly modifiers to GCHandle and DependentHandle #93178
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix MT debugging experience. #90771
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [browser] logging improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Trim globalization code #93473
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [WIP] Unified intrinsics emission front-end experiments #91993
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • [mono] Perform the class init at runtime when static fields of BEFORE_FIELD_INIT type are accessed #86787
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix test build error when BuildAsStandalone is true #93457
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Fix CodeGen::instGen_Set_Reg_To_Imm #93411
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • dotnet tool restore --interactive hangs forever #24220
    9.0.1xx
  • [wasm] run browser-bench sample with https connection #36144

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Define precedence relationship with MSBuild properties and CLI args #26447
    Discussion
  • rc2 tagged sdk cross build for ppc64le fails #36062
  • Qualys scan showing vulnerabilities in SDK #30659
  • dotnet tool has a verbosity mode but it isn't silent in mode "quiet" #35173
  • xunit - Vulnerabilities #22178

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36152
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #36151
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #36150
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Also exempt RuntimeIdentifiers Fixes #35575 #36149
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 22.1.3 in /eng/dependabot #36135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #36078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 22.1.2 to 22.1.3 in /eng/dependabot #36134
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main

Updated

  • Enable users to install unlisted version of tool if specify the exact match of the version of the tool #36021
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Skip workload integrity check on Linux and non-sudo #36123
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Remove the extra diag output #36115
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create project templates target to 9.0 #34996
    untriaged, Area-Common templates
  • [wasm] Move PublishTrimmed=true from pack to SDK #36094
    Area-WasmSdk, 9.0.1xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: New operator %% for canonical Modulus operations #7599
    Likely Never
  • Proposed change to method group natural type #7364

Updated

  • [Proposal]: String/Character escape sequence `\e` as a short-hand for `\u001b` (`<ESCAPE>`) #7400
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Lock statement pattern #7104
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: u8 string interpolation #7072
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Breaking change warnings #7189
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: method attribute target for records for targeting primary constructor #7047
    Working Set
  • [Proposal]: file local types #5529
    11.0
  • Champion "Async Main" (C# 7.1) #97
    7.1
  • Champion "Async Streams" (including async disposable) (16.3, Core 3) #43
    8.0
  • Proposal: Allow [AsyncMethodBuilder(...)] on methods #1407
    10.0
  • Champion: fixed-sized buffers #1314
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Clarify rules for diagnostic ID in `[Experimental]` attribute #7597
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Add proposal for partial type inference #7582

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `MemberNotNullWhen` does not report "Member must have a non-null value when exiting when" when expression is returned #70398
  • Debugging issue with identically named files #70393

Closed

  • Collection expressions fail at runtime with ImmutableArray #70351
    17.9
  • Report diagnostic for collection expression with collection initializer target type where Add() returns a value #69136
    17.9
  • Missing error for interceptors for dynamic calls #70321
    17.9
  • RValue receivers are improperly spilled in some scenarios #70356
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34216.32 #70394
  • Missing CS0177 (unassigned out params) if method calls a local function #70391
  • Interceptor for non-existent methods? #70317
    Backlog
  • Analyzer assembly load failure has too generic message #70148

PullRequests

Created

  • Separate build and test phases in integration tests #70400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add refactoring to convert a primary-constructor-parameter to a normal constructor. #70399
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Validate diagnostic ID in Experimental attribute #70397
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow invisible editor support to handle open aspx files. #70396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: prefer ReadOnlySpan<T> over Span<T> in overload resolution (#70328) #70395
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8

Merged

  • Collection expressions - error when we can't emit good codegen for ImmutableArray #70384
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify and improve performance of NameGenerator.EnsureUniqueness methods #70373
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Simplify checksum caching code. #70346
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Ensure rValue receiver is properly captured if there is an await in call arguments #70362
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • EnC: Replace debug-only assertion with release check to fail fast #70380
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #70378
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • File types need to account for pathmap #70322
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Support XAML LSP in VS Code #70170
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Implementation of C# code mapper #70309
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Deprecate API and add NFW telemetry for it #70365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Trying to fix integration tests #70371
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Optimize `T? ?? <expr>` to `T.GetValueOrDefault(<expr>)` for a side-effectless `<expr>` where `T?` is a nullable value type #70199
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.9
  • Faster checksum syncing for documents. #70385
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix emitting Custom Attribute deltas #70350
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Update deleted lambdas to throw MissingMethodException #70184
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Document deviations from the C# standard #70121
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: synthesized list types should implement ICollection and IList #70288
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
  • Handle generic types as parameters of attributes in `MetadataDecoder` #70151
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Rename Razor compiler assemblies #69655
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Server - ILogger is not logging to browser dev tools console #51424
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #51423
  • [.NET 8 RC2] HttpContext is null in Login.razor (Identity scaffold) with InteractiveServer globally enabled #51422
  • Difference in pattern matching between MVC and endpoints #51421
  • Blazor sets EditForm Model to null in unexpected situations #51420
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Using FallbackPolicy significantly increase used memory on Ubuntu in kubernetes #51416
  • NavLink support for route parameters #51415
  • Split Area for pages #51411
  • An exception occurs when running an app using BlazorWebView on a machine different from the one on which it was built. #51409
  • Blazor template issues with Google Authentication [dotnet 8 rc2] #51402
  • Allow urls of identity endpoints be customizable #51401
  • Blazor SupplyParameterFromQuery Routing not usable [dotnet 8.rc2] #51398
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializerContext still doesnt work out of the box #51397

Closed

  • Template icons appear blurry in Visual Studio on high DPI monitors #51417
  • Perf regression: plaintext #51382
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #51399
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, fortunes #51400
  • Hotreload not working in .cshtml files while debugging UNLESS the project configuration is literally named "Debug" #43910
    8.0.x
  • Blazor forms should render target URL in action attribute as root-relative (absolute path), not fully qualified #51380
    8.0.0
  • Server Layout used by RC2 Blazor Web App page inside Client project #51376
  • Typo in QuickGrid XML Comments #51405
    9.0-preview1
  • Failed to log out user with error "Uncaught TypeError: Cannot read properties of null (reading 'classList')" after publishing Blazor Web Individual App #51215
    8.0.0
  • The runtime<->aspnetcore shared src is out of sync #18943
  • When Calling Methods From JS To DotNet #51100
    .NET 9 Planning
  • .NET 7 Cookie Bad Request not Encoding Value #51192
  • HeadContent treats content as static regardless of RenderMode set #50998
    .NET 9 Planning
  • NavLink not working in InteractiveServer #51297
    8.0.0
  • OnLocationChanged not fired in .NET 8 Preview 7 Blazor Web App #49950
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve MultipartReader performance #51426
    Perf, area-networking
  • Add 8.0 PRs to servicing project #51425
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix form actions (clientside logic) #51404
    area-blazor, * NO MERGE *
  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add non-prerendering modes #51395
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update template icons to higher resolution versions #51418
    area-mvc, 9.0-preview1
  • Fix form actions for apps deployed behind reverse proxy #51403
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0.0
  • Fix QuickGrid typo in comment 'rid' to 'grid' #51406
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine and retry failing tests #51362
    area-signalr, 9.0-preview1
  • Sync shared code from runtime #51386
    area-runtime, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Dispose CTS in HubConnection streaming #51137
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 8.0.0
  • [main] Critical fix to output cache; remove OutputCacheEntry recycling #51348
    area-networking, area-middleware
  • Update SDK #51240
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix script tag insertion in DomMerging #51184
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • How to debug memory leak that is not clear on dotnet-dump? #4139
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [Dotnet Monitor] Small Fix For SDM Triggers #4332

Updated

  • Add Meter Tags, Instrument Tags, and Scopes to System Diagnostics Metrics #4324
  • Replace logging for logging abstractions in netcore.client library #4296

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MAUI Blazor RC2 breaks <script src="foo.js"> type tag includes within body of .razor files #18065
  • WinUI only. Back-button drawn only for the very first NavigationPage to be set to Detail. #18064
  • Shell TitleView on iOS not occupying requested height #18060
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.7.8842] Labels with max lines and linebreakmode not working even with adding handler workaround #18059
    .NET 8 GA
  • [iOS] After migration from net7.0-ios to net8.0-ios app crashes randomly in release mode with UseInterpreter="False" #18058
    .NET 8 GA
  • Valid CSS not parsed correctly, breaks app #18056
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Swipeviews with invoked properties crash the app in Release #18055
  • .NET MAUI MacCatalyst Menu Bar items count problem #18054
  • C# Hot reload not working for Android #18053
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.5.8529] FlyoutPage Navigation broken in Android #18050
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.1.7762] TableView row click command does not fire #18047
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Desenvolvimento MAUI error #18044

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using 8.0 Database.SqlQuery() to call FreeTextTable() #32066
  • Warning when connecting to Azure SQL without a retrying execution strategy #32065
  • Altering a nullable column to not null generates invalid SQL commands for migration #32062
  • `ExecuteUpdate` not working with owned type property #32058
  • Model validation throws for non-generic collection properties #32055

Closed

  • Provide a way to return a joined result #31972
  • Migration bundles directly to a docker container #31999
  • Migrations bundle add a paramter to select the used schema #31997
  • IEntityTypeConfiguration<T> defined on a record DB model type does not seem to be picked up or applied during model building #31993
  • Is a value comparer really required for record types? #31983
  • Using HasData to seed values in a new table cannot retrieve ColumnTypes #31888
  • Composite FK annotation #31881
  • Using database user-defined scalar functions separately #32056
  • Configuring the owned type on the derived type first throws an exception #27404
    8.0.0
  • Bug: Owned type configuration is dependent on registration order #26218
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.1 to 1.10.2 #32064
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.11 to 7.0.12 #32063
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/8.0] Don't throw for non-generic collection types #32059
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Remove the owned navigation on the derived type when configuring it on the base. #32041
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.57.0 #31688
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
